title: Daria Reference In Mystic Lux Skin
body:
Just when I thought the Mystic skin couldn't get any more perfect, she says MYSTIK SPIRAL during her ult which is the name of Trent's band from Daria. 

The fluttering scepter kills me when she recalls too. 
Thank y'all!

replies.body: It wasn't something that was intended, but as an avid Daria fan, it did make me pretty happy when I heard it. :3
YAS KATEY! SLAY ME KATEY!!!! Amazing skin. so so happy with the final result! we might change our name.
